author: joget
title: Accelerating Enterprise Adoption
description: Building enterprise and institutional decentralized applications is too complex, time consuming, costly, and requires special scarce skills.
solution: We will extend our Cardano plugin to enable business and citizen developers to rapidly develop and scale dapps using drag and drop features.
experience: Ministry of Finance, France; Ministry of Foreign Trade, UAE; Boeing, USA; BP Exploration, India; Hong Kong Monetary Authority, Hong Kong
